text: Ingrid Remmers (26 March 1965 – 9 August 2021) was a German politician. She was a member of The Left. She was a member of the Bundestag from the state of North Rhine-Westphalia from 2009 until 2013 and from 2017 until her death in 2021. Remmers was born in Ibbenbüren, West Germany. Remmers died on 9 August 2021 at the age of 56. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Bundestag biography Category:1965 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians of the Left Party Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Ingrid Remmers
